means: 诺曼法语的，讲诺曼法语的

sentence.Network_en: Norman French was the language of the aristocracy, including the King and his court.
sentence.Network_cn: 诺曼法语是包括国王以及其朝臣们都讲的贵族语.

sentence.Network_en: English mainly came from the Anglo - Saxon and Norman French languages.
sentence.Network_cn: 主要是来自英国的盎格鲁撒克逊和诺曼法语.

sentence.Network_en: Some English people are of the Norman - French origin.
sentence.Network_cn: 而还有一些英国人的是诺曼血统.
